website_summaries.verdict: While it's a costly model, it's also an investment that will provide a customized massage thanks to the multiple settings and functions it offers.
pros: Combines deep massage, air pressure, and heat for one of the most complete foot massages available
cons: It's expensive and the unit is somewhat large and awkward to store
The kneading function can't be turned off

customer_reviews.title: So painful
customer_reviews.text: I have a planter facilities and after I read the positive reviews I thought to give it a shot. I really wanted to love this massager. I loved it for the first hour, but then I started to feel the pain. It was squeezing my toes so hard, it did nothing to my arch and my heels. The next day My feet were hurting me so bad. Therefore I have decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nawar

customer_reviews.title: Relief for aching feet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my wife who has chronically achy feet. She liked it at the 1rst setting but then she tried setting 5 and fell in love!! Excellent product...highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Borda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent after a long day of standing in a class room
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my wife for Christmas because she is a teacher and she has to stand all day. Since I gave her the Miko Shiatsu Home Foot Massager, she is not able to sit without putting her feet into it. The gentle heat, adjustable pressure points and 15-minute timer are perfect. Additionally, you will not be able to beat the price. GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Problem is
customer_reviews.text: Ok here’s the deal, all you need to know. I’m a size 12 and it only messages the front half of my feet and constantly squeezes my feet out of the machine making you have to work your feet back in. My wife is size 5 and it didn’t fit her feet well at all either. She said it just pinched her feet and was not enjoyable. We returned it. Don’t waste your money poorly designed. Trust me I wanted it to work more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Phortyster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foot massager
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I might buy another just so that I have a back up if this ever dies. Not sure what those random people are saying that it smashes toes. I thought maybe their feet were too short and it’s pitting pressure in different places than mine. But then my 4yo kids wanted to use it and they loved it. They would have told me if it was hurting their feet. So if a child thinks it’s fine.. not sure what to tell those people. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Painful!
customer_reviews.text: The pressure was unbearable. I tried to use it for a few minutes but I couldn't take it. It felt like the bones in my feet were being crushed.....not exactly that bad but it was too much for me. Hated it! And it was loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mobile Dog Groomer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My feet are in love with my husband. This foot massager is amazing!!! The only thing I would change is maybe it would have more compression on the heel of my foot. This machine is life changing! You will never complain about your feet hurting again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The product has many positive reviews. So, I decided to buy it. When I got it and opened the box then it had a strong toxic odor! At the lowest level of pressure massager very strongly compress my feet. Although my feet healthy, I could not walk for a long time after massage. In the morning I sent him back.
customer_reviews.author: Aybek Madaminov

customer_reviews.title: If you’ve had a real foot massage, you won’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. I have no idea why this has so many wonderful reviews and unfortunately I bought it because I read them and believed them. I used it three times on different days to make sure how I felt. I kept it on the lowest setting each time and increased the time starting at 6 minutes the first time. It felt anything but relaxing and at times felt as though the front of my feet were being crushed. The third time I used it I had trouble walking because my toes hurt so bad. I have been getting foot messages from a masseuse and all I can say is this thing is neither pleasant nor relaxing. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that it focused more on the upper part of your foot and a lot on the toes. I needed something to massage my arches and heels. This did not do the job. However, I did re turn it with no problems and got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Next to a personal touch this massager is the next best thing. It comes with a timer for 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. I am a professional massage Therapist and bought this product for my wife for Christmas and she absolutely loves this product. Next to a personal touch this massager is the next best thing. It comes with a timer for 15 minutes. At the end of the treatment not only are your feet relaxed but the body. It hits all the meridian trigger points in the feet to work the whole body systematically. I highly recommend this product especially for the price. It is well put together and a must have for our house.
customer_reviews.author: winddancer76

customer_reviews.title: Its a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this product with high hopes after reading the reviews; however, I am disappointed. The largest problem is craftsmanship. I have had this less than 60 days and it turns off intermittently and randomly. When it does work, it does the basic job but does not his the back of the foot or support the heel but that is not a deal breaker and, moreover, it does not really matter if you can't get the unit to turn on or stay on. I am looking to see if I can return this thing after I hit "submit"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He had it opened and was using within 10 minutes of opening. He is an electrician who does roadwork lighting and walks 2-6 miles a day. You can tell from his face he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: My new obsession!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for quite a while before I ordered this since I assumed it would be a waste. I have planter fasciitis and was hoping it would help with that. Well, this massager is fantastic! The pressure is surprisingly hard. I had to ease into it but I notice a difference. I have to position my feet just right to make sure the arch gets hit. I’m so glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Painful to the toes and does not Massage entire foot
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised this got so many Great reviews. It squishes your toes way too tight. I am very tough and this was pretty painful on the toes. It barely massages the heel and the middle of your foot. It does not heat up at all. I ended up buying the Arealer and this one works much much better. Don’t waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Young

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, a little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the air pressure is very strong and the shiatsu massage is excellent. At first I was a bit disappointed at the 15 minute limit, but it's a reasonable limitation to avoid causing foot pain. This loses a couple of stars because my unit squeaks slightly with every rotation, and the heat function is imperceptible. I had heat turned off the first couple of times I used it, then when I left it on I realized I couldn't even feel a difference. Also the plastic on one of the remotes is damaged, and the other is peeling. Not great construction. A good machine, but I'm not sure it's worth $140.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I have Planter Facitus
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. This thing is amazing. I have Planter Facitus. I am also a teacher and on my feet all day. My husband is tired of me begging him to rub my feet every night lol. This mimics a real massage. The pressure is great. My feet feel so much better. I wish I would have found this "years ago!
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing, but needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this thing, works good and is very relaxing. My only complaint is that the slots where the feet go need to be bigger. I have to keep pushing my feet in the whole time or the rollers rub under my toes and it can be painful sometimes, my wife doesn't have that problem because her feet are smaller.
customer_reviews.author: TobyH.

customer_reviews.title: This product is completely amazing and exactly what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: As I read in other reviews the machine will not work on the heal. Now this is correct if you have anything over a size 11 mens. This product is completely amazing and exactly what the doctor ordered. The multiple settings are awesome. I use the highest setting and find myself cringing at certain points. Not sure if I am in pain or complete bliss. I have used other products and the power settings would leave you wanting more. I am on my feet most of the day and long for some relief. This product has done the job. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Soronen

customer_reviews.title: Not very tender.
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! The machine is adjustable from minimal pressure to crushing pressure with nothing in between. I couldn’t really tell if the heat is on or off. That could be my condition and not the machine. It is really helping me despite its flaws. I have neuropathy in both feet. This sucker is creating new nerve pathways by punishing my deadened feet back to life. I use it twice a day and can now wiggle and feel my once completely numb toes.
customer_reviews.author: PeterP

customer_reviews.title: Feet saver
customer_reviews.text: Great product and worth the money. I’m a teacher and am always begging my husband to massage my feet. I finally bought this and he made fun of me for it at first. Now he is always trying to take it from me. He loves it too. I tried to order another massager in a different brand and we hated it. It didn’t compare to this one. You can change the amount or pressure and how it massages. My feet feel so much better after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: The default settings will probably work well for most people but the higher positions are downright uncomfortable and can be painful to some
customer_reviews.text: The unit is quality made and works well. The controls can be a little confusing but with some practice are ok. The remote controls are worthless (hence just 4 stars). It seems you have to be about 3 inches from the massager for it to work properly. The default settings will probably work well for most people but the higher positions are downright uncomfortable and can be painful to some. I am a size 11.5 shoe size and my feet fit well. Note: I put a pair of thick socks on and the massager actually felt like a real masseuse and was very comfortable. Overall I satisfied with my purchase. Will see what future use brings.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massager and overall I am disappointed. It did not live up to my expectations. The area that it puts the most pressure is near the front of the foot. I need it to massage my arch and heel (for plantar fasciitis) and this does not do it. Also the air pressure settings are not subtle enough. Setting 1 is too low and setting 2 is too hard, setting 3 is like an elephant crunching my feet.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriatic arthritis, and my toe bones are breaking down from it. I also have plantar fasciitis, so my feet hurt bad and often. There are days that I struggle to walk. My husband got me this for Christmas, and it has been making a huge difference. It feels good while it is working, and reduces my pain afterwards. It has been making life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is not good. This massager came with the Most terrible biohazard smell as if it was disinfected and not brand new. I wear a 6.5 and based off the reviews thought I'd have more than enough room for my heels. This thing barely touches my heel which is where the majority of the pain is. I even tried pushing my feet entirely inside and still not luck. For the balls and top part of you foot is good but heels get not love. I will update after a couple more uses but so far my feet are not happy.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t even been a year and after light use, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good Massage; More Heat Needed
customer_reviews.text: The massage options and actions are very good, providing a nice stimulation to the feet, especially from the arches to the toes. Massage to the heels is somewhat gentler. The heat level is quite low; I would recommend stronger/deeper heat and even a function to adjust the heat level -- this model has only a heat on/heat off option.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Hanover, Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Unequally distributed pressure - not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess my expectation was different. Basically all it does is press around the feet with Air inflated pockets and a bumpy bottom that moves. The pressure is not equally distributed, at the maximum intensity the toes get almost crushed when you hardly feel anything towards the other end, and practically no pressure around heel. Some might like what it is, I’m not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: PALS

customer_reviews.title: Like this massager.
customer_reviews.text: The foot massager works just as advertised. Could have a little more heat but the massager is great! Received the one year warranty card a few days after I had thrown away the packing material so didn't have the order number anymore. One year warranty card should have been in the original packaging. You're suppose to unplug the unit after each use which is kind of a nuisance but manageable. Can't say we have had any pain relief. That's not why we bought this unit. Anyway, my husband and I like the unit. Would buy again. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Otte

customer_reviews.title: What a Change a Foot Massage Makes
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after I placed my order, I started to question the wisdom of spending money on a foot massager... I love this thing!! I just put my feet into the the massager, lean back on my couch and sip a glass of wine as my feet have all of the days tiredness messaged away. I highly recommend this foot massager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This foot massager is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager is amazing. I love its power. I can’t even use it on the highest level. Interestingly I figured out that if I use it barefooted I can highest level I can withstand is level 2 (there are 5 levels), but when I wear socks I can go up to level 4. I’m guessing it’s because with socks the massager can glide better over my feet and socks help cushion the pressure. I use it twice a day for my achy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Maisonet

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! I would have given it five stars, but the remote needs a bit of improvement. If you are sitting back relaxing with your feet in the massager, the remote doesn't work. You literally have to be hovering over the device for it to work..kind of defeats the purpose. Also, my husband has a size 13 foot and it doesn't quite reach his heal. Having said all that, he really does love this machine..he's been using it twice a day since Christmas! A great buy..so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: katydid

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I have bought in years
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the most amazing wonderful foot massager I have ever had the extreme pleasure of using. It truly is amazing and I would recommend it to everybody ..this thing gives an awesome massage and very good pressure for people who like a hard pressure. But it can also do soft in case your feet are sensitive. My feet feel more amazing than they ever have even after a traditional massage with a person . Highly highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KatK

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This Miko Shiatsu Foot Massager is by far the best purchase I've ever made. The different features, compression, massage, kneading and heat provide all the stimulation needed to both feet. We started with level 3 (default setting) and found it perfect! We strongly recommend this for anyone searching for a bit of relaxation or for therapeutic reasons. Your whole entire body benefits from this foot massager.
customer_reviews.author: Louise T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My friend's podiatrist recommended it to him for his plantar fasciitis so I tried it too. Really love this foot massager! It's relaxing and easy to use. Doesn't take up alot of space. The only thing you have to do is connect the electrical cords and its good to go. Don't forget to take the plastic slips out of the remote controls. Currently it"s a fixture in our living room. It you have foot pain or just tired feet, you should try it. You won't be disappointed. I also think it would be an excellent gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foot massager
customer_reviews.text: This review is from my wife who made this purchase. “The Miko foot massager is great. I have huge bunions on both feet, and by the end of the day, my feet ache so much. In the two weeks since I received this massager, I have used it just about every day. It not only feels wonderful, but also relieves the pain in my feet. I am so happy with this product and encourage anyone who has foot pain to purchase it. Like me, you’ll be very glad you did.”
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect foot massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic foot massager. It really packs a punch (in a good way) and works out all the kinks from the most stressed parts of your feet. I am used to strong massages, but even at pressure setting 2 out of 5, it was already pretty intense. The only downside for me was that the massage is very focused on the front 2/3 of the foot (toes, ball, and arch). Meanwhile, there's very little done on the heel and nothing for the ankle. It gets the job done, but at this price point I was expecting a little more on the heel/ankle. Therefore 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tomokun

customer_reviews.title: Love this massager!
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager has some POWER! With 5 different settings, you can have light or deep pressure. It's been great for relieving tired and sore feet. My plantar fasciitis and arch pain have significantly decreased. And it just feels dreamy. It is supposed to be heated, but doesn't get very warm (or it seems warm at all a lot of the time). More heat would have earned a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, my husband bought it for me but he loves it more! It didn't help with plantar fasciitis like a lot views said it would. I wish the massagers were all over and not just on the bottom. Make sure you start slow with the pressure I went to highest thinking it would help my pain but all it did was smush my foot and bruise the top of it. Over all, if your looking for something to relax your feet in for 15 mins then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a little pricey, but my wife works in retail and stands on her feet all day long. She has Raynaud's disease, so her feet are a bit more tender than most. After a full day of work, she comes home and we wash her feet and put them into this massager for a bit and it really takes the pain away for her. I recommend it to anyone with aching and swollen feet at the end of a long day.
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: Relax and ENJOY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after searching for something my wife, who works on her feet all day long, would like for Christmas. Since I ordered it to arrive about 2 weeks before, which it did, it was under the tree and a topic of conversation until the Holiday. Our family was here for the opening, and at first, my wife, without trying it, seemed somewhat disappointed. Everyone else was excited about it, and they tried it before she did. ALL of them, gave it HIGHEST MARKS, male & female. My wife finally tried it, and, since, has used it everyday, two or more times per day, since. It's a WINNER...
customer_reviews.author: Real Al

customer_reviews.title: Pressure does not RELEASE. PAINFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This item is garbage. Used it two times and both times the pressure wouldn’t realease my feed and hurt tf out of me. The pressure wouldn’t let go. Avoid this item and pick a different company.
customer_reviews.author: ilir

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very relaxing once you find the pressure that’s right for your feet. I like the high pressure setting because the massager inflates with air, hugging your feet, and the kneading motion is pretty close to someone actually massaging your feet. Not quite the same as hands, but definitely worth the $$ to be able to have an on demand massage for sore feet. It operates for 15 minutes at a time so we usually just keep the remote handy and cycle it through a few times each sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown 421

customer_reviews.title: Nothing going on here
customer_reviews.text: The pressure is awkward, but it still does not get any real massage going. Probably just as well to use a vibrator. Definitely does not touch the arches and barely feels like anything on the heels. With pressure the balls of the feet get some action but not much. Very disappointed. Returned and moved on back to manual massage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Our whole family loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my size 12 feet. It takes a little button pushing to figure out how to get it working just right. I gave up using the remote to adjust it. This has adjustable 'air bladders' on top to let you adjust how hard you want your feet massaged. I had tried another foot massager that didn't work nearly as well because there was nothing to 'push' your feet down onto the rollers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, using it everyday
customer_reviews.text: I’m working from home and on the computer most of the day so this thing help me a lot to relax my lags. You can choose the type of speed and hardness you desire and has many options of massage. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Sage

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this massager. It came well packaged, and looks very high end. The pressure feels great, and the rollers don't jab your feet. I wear a size 8 shoe and my boyfriend wears a size 9. Neither of us feel like it really hits the front of our heel like we want it to, but that was only the first use. It did seem if I leaned back a bit it hit that area a little better. My feet usually hurt me the moment I get out of bed, but today I woke up with no pain. First time in a while! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D

customer_reviews.title: Gets too tight on feet when using.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product and it is not worth the money. I used it once and found that it hurts my feet instead of making them feel better. I have a size 12 shoe, so my girlfriend who is a size 6 tried it and it hurt her feet as well. I would not recommend this product to anyone, I bought it so I'm stuck with it, hopefully others will not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last for helping pain as soon as machine stops
customer_reviews.text: Does not help neuropathy except feeling a little better while using machine. As soon as you stop it pains returns . The more I use it the more I realize it doesn’t help except a little while in actual use only When it is done 15 minutes pain is right back. Very very disappointed I spent $ 145.00 for this. Heat setting is next to useless like everyone says Higher pressure on feet really hurts. I gave it a three rating yesterday but reducing it to two today
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love <3
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good foot massager for months. They were either too expensive, or affordable with bad reviews. So, i went on a whim and brought this one. I am soooo happy with this purchase. I work in law enforcement and when i come home my feet hurt so bad sometimes. BUT, not anymore!!!! I like that you can change the setting either more kneading or more pressure. Depending on the day I may need more of one then the other. I don’t like the bulky cord, but that a small dislike since I enjoy the massager so much. Hope it last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: B.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your parents' aching feet !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Mother's Day and so far I've noticed a few things. I think the product is great and looks very fancy. But I noticed the cloth inside is very thin so it will probably wear out with long term use or if you use it a lot. Also it seems a bit fragile inside the machine so if you were to stand up with your feet in the massager you will probably break it completely. The spaces for feet are big so most people will be able to fit, and the different settings are great.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Beware - NO SIDE MASSAGE  - just a front of foot massage - going back tomorrow
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to get this foot massager. I had one that I used for years that was a couple of hundred bucks 20 years ago. It hurt but was amazing. The best part was the fact that it had heat and massaged the sides of my feet. This one claims to have heat (i don't feel it) and it completely neglects the sides and heel and even the arch. It really sucks and I'm surprised at the positive reviews. Makes me wonder about the validity. As a truthful and honest review I say don't waist your time or money. This piece of crap goes back tomorrow. I'll be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Odel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. I thought it would last at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken within a year. Of course I no longer have the box it came in. Disappointed. I thought it would last at least a year. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foot massager, the adjustable pressure provides a great massage for multiple users. Overall my husband and I really like it with one exception. We have to actively push our heels to the inside of the massager throughout the message which means it is not as relaxing as it could be when your legs are totally relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: CandyMac

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot Massager!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Father’s Day and he absolutely loves this. It actually fits his size 13 & 1/2 feet and is able to get all sore areas. I have size 7 feet and I’m also able to use it without any issues- although be careful with the pressure because it might be painful if you have smaller feet. It has 5 different pressure settings and I usually don’t go past the 4th one. Customer service is also fantastic, they send you follow up emails just to make sure that you’re satisfied. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nayadee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product, solid and well built. I just think it’s a bit expensive for what it does, and in that sense I’m not so sure I should’ve bought it. It feels okay, but not anywhere close to what human hands would do for your feet. I like the pressure around the top of the foot, that feels really nice. But whatever rolls on the bottom can be downright painful if you lean too much on it. It’s a sort of entertaining product to have but I’m not sure it has any medicinal purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Camille V.

customer_reviews.title: Feels so Good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of foot problems over the years and had never thought about getting a foot massager. My husband surprised me with the Miko Shiatsu Foot Massager for my 55th birthday and I LOVE IT. I love that it warms my feet, which are usually cold, and the massage is WONDERFUL. I'm hoping that it will help me with my plantar's fasciitis as I have read the reviews and it seems to have helped many others. I sometimes use this twice a day it is so relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Claims to fit up to a size Men's 12, and my husband's size 10 1/2 feet just fit, snugly. I have size 8 feet and was disappointed that the bottom/sides of my feet did not get the kneading contact I had hoped, also the contact on my heels was a bit painful. I went by the numerous high star reviews and even purchased the additional extended warranty but it just did not work out for us. And regarding all similar foot massagers that are configured like this one, I wish they would make them with an angled height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P.

customer_reviews.title: SOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my new Miko Foot Massager! I am beginning to feel like I’m getting plantar fasciitis (although I’m not diagnosed) and my feet were just screaming at me some days. I have used this while I’m watching tv and eating dinner (since that’s a time I’m sitting still) and I’m in HEAVEN!!! It FEELS so good. The masssage is intense (in a good way), and the heat is awesome too. I’ve never written a review before, but wanted to do it for this bc it’s so awesome. Could be a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: So far .. So good
customer_reviews.text: I've got, I assume, peripheral neuropathy, so any discussion of pain relief, at this point, is kind of moot. My wife and I both enjoy using this massager. I have found that I wish the heat was just a bit warmer. Pressure wise .. 4 is good for me, 2 is good for my wife, and 5 is too much for me, so I guess that takes care of the settings. Only had it for a week, so I still hope it might have some effect on my neuropathy .. not very optimistic, but still hope.
customer_reviews.author: Ben from NWA

customer_reviews.title: Average- was expecting better :(
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Massages mid-foot well (sole reason I use it before bedtime most nights) Cons: Can't feel the heat at all, no noticeable difference between different "modes", doesn't massage the heel (has 1-2 sharp pins that barely poke it- rather uncomfortable), my vizio TV remote occasionally turns on the massager! Would give 5 stars if the heat was appreciable + heel was massaged
customer_reviews.author: Schnappi

customer_reviews.title: Great even for bigger feet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my boyfriend got this for my birthday and Ive been using it for a couple days and it's been nice! I do love the fact that even with a slightly bigger foot (size 10/11 depending on shoe) it fits very well in this without having my feet hang out of the massager and my heel gets massage. I was concerned about how it would fit but it worked well. I signed up for the 1 year warranty and I also received complimentary foot inserts for when the current one gets warm. It was a pleasant surprise. Great experience so far with the product
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: It is the best you can give to your feet
customer_reviews.text: After reading much of the reviews in amazon and other places , i ordered this.. i walk a lot as part of my exercise routine and have Plantar fasciitis . At the end of the day when i use this machine for 15 mins , i am ready to walk another couple of miles.. This machines does a awesome job of massaging your feet so good , most of the pain disappear.. Highly recommend for anyone who has similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: S V

customer_reviews.title: I can dance!!
customer_reviews.text: For years I have had difficulty walking because my foot and toes ached due to arthritis in my feet. I have been using this foot massager for a couple of weeks. It made a definite difference in my foot and toe flexibility. The arthritis is still there but the massager restores movement. I don't know if it would work for everyone but I would recommend trying it if your foot pain is not too severe.
customer_reviews.author: KatWoman

customer_reviews.title: Finally some relief from neuropathy
customer_reviews.text: What a great surprise to purchase this Miko foot massage and gave it work so well. I've been fighting neuropathy & planter facetious without much luck. I bought the Mika shiatsu foot massager & I finally feel some relief. I've been using it 3 to 4 times throughout the day, with socks on. I'm a size 12 foot & it fits great. is quiet & really has made a difference for me in the short time I've had it. We worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before I went on a cruise and took it with me... (don't judge me), one of the best decisions I've ever made! Coming back to the room after a full day of walking and sore feet, only to have the magic of a great, warm foot massage provided, by this magical machine was... extraordinary! So don't pay no mind to the TSA agent laughing at you when he opens your luggage and pull the trigger before your next cruise, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose G

customer_reviews.title: You have the ability to create a strong massage on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I like this massager for my feet. I recommend you give it a few trials to realize how to include your heels better, how to shift weight if you want to emphasize more at some points of your feet. Place your feet all the way in so your toes touch the end. It's a powerful machine and I was really, really pleased that it wasn't too heavy. The appreciation from Miko New York is going to make you smile and......feel appreciated for choosing their product.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spend some money on a foot massager, since I bought a cheaper one, and it was not good. I have pain in my feet (I suspect planter fasciitis.), and this has helped me. I like that it has pressure on the top as well. My foot is about a women's size 7. For the most part, you can move your foot around to get to the spots you want. It is quiet. My only complaint is that you have to reset it after 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: heidi howe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it worked, but it stopped working in February and I had received it for Christmas. I was really disappointed! I can not get it replaced or repaired from this company, the return date was the end of January and I just went on line to see what I could do and any other actions were done March 7th. My husband spent more and expected better quality. I do not write negative reviews unless it is something that really requires one! Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: ypwf

customer_reviews.title: REPLACED MY BOYFRIEND
customer_reviews.text: This thing has replaced my boyfriend lol. I have sore feet often and I wore out my poor boyfriends hands with all the massages I was requesting over the last 12 years. And here’s the thing.. I like it deep kneeding. This machine is a power horse. You can go light or you can go extreme and I’m can’t even do extreme because it’s a little intense. Works very well. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Miko unit makes a tremendous difference
customer_reviews.text: As a 260lb utterly flat footed 53 yr old diabetic I have always been plagued with some sort of foot discomfort. I have to say the Miko unit gives me instant relief. I use the unit daily along with random epson salt foot soaks. The difference has been extremely positive for me. Lastly, I have size 14 feet and while unit could be a tad longer (bit snug) I feel like I am getting a whole foot benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Mckinley Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use my foot massager almost every night. I have had surgery to replace a joint in one of my toes and it has helped me improve the toe's flexibility, I also injured the bottom of my heel and the massager has helped speed up my recovery. The massage is also very relaxing overall. The customer service for this product is great, they offered to send me an additional pair of foot inserts in case I wear out the ones that initially came with the product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Great Foot Massager!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this foot massager. It fits my Size 12 Men's feet but it does not do a whole lot for the heel of my feet. I really bought it for having the balls of my feet massaged, and there it does great work. Beware: You can set the intensity high enough to really inflict pain (but we like it).
customer_reviews.author: VinSanity

customer_reviews.title: My new bestie🤗🤗
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager is boss!! I stand on my feet all day for work so my puppies are often tired and sore at the end of the day. So glad I made a worthwhile investment in this massager because I work hard and deserve it! One thing..follow the recommendation that comes with the massager and go slowly. I turned it up to full speed too quickly and the pressure was so intense I screamed.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Foot
customer_reviews.text: The right way to satisfy one’s feet is to use a foot massager. The question is which foot massager to choose. The one that was purchased was the MIKO foot massager. It released the pain and the feet feel refreshed. Its opening is wide and amazing, the twelve foot size just reach it limited in the foot massager. Don’t want to say, but it leave one's feet as if a day after a workout, at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands birthday, he loves it! It came as a recommendation from my sister. He tried hers and loved it. He is diabetic so can’t really use the pressure setting to strong but can help with his feet being cold and the massage can help with circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Painful to use.
customer_reviews.text: Neither me or my wife can use this as it causes pain while it is massaging and also residual pain in foot nerves throughout the foot. It's like putting your foot in an undulating vice. I have size 13 foot so can see why it would be tight, but my wife has size 8 foot and still cannot tolerate the pain it produces in the feet. My only option now is to sell it on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: BillyPat

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my BFF....twice. Sadly, the unit stopped working within a few weeks. However....if you get a good one it is a fantastic unit. She loved using the heated, massage to make her tired feet feel renewed. Amazon customer service was great for both failed units. I wish it would work longer. I may have gotten two bad units, as the ratings are favorable, but I had to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: It massages well but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a real massage. I do enjoy the heating feature but it really doesn’t heat up as much as I expected. I’m an artist so I sit at my desk and draw all day. I needed something that would help me relax. This is okay but for the price I wish it heated up more. You can barely feel the heat.
customer_reviews.author: EShiba

customer_reviews.title: A great part of a foot maintenance program
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this foot massager daily for 3 days so far. It massages the the front 3/4 of the feet just fine but is kinda lacking on the heel. So far I can feel a benefit and it gets better as I adjust my sitting position. I believe there is a learning curve to get the maximum benefit. I think if I combine some stretching exercises along with massage my foot pain will all but disappear. Overall I am pleased with this machine so far
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, not at all like a foot massage
customer_reviews.text: This is not relaxing. It feels weird and the massaging balls aren’t large so they rub your feet in a very pointed way. My grandparents won’t put it past the first level because they think anything more is too intense. This is SUCH a waste of money. It sounds so cool in theory, but this is nothing like a foot massage and at the end of the day doesn’t even feel good.
customer_reviews.author: FaustineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great massager.
customer_reviews.text: This massager works great. My wife was very pleased with the way it functioned and it's ease of use. We shopped around some and found the same massager but they were more expensive. BTW, this is the first thing I've bought from Amazon where the seller contacted me to make sure we were pleased with the purchase. So, I highly recommend this seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wingman

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit as a Christmas gift for my friend, who works full time on her feet. She also suffers from plantar fascia. After work she uses the unit for 30-45 mins on a daily basis. She stated that her feet feel much better now. Note: she also uses copper fit socks while at work so she's not sure how much each product is contributing to her comfort. My guess is the massage unit is providing the most comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie Scarponi

customer_reviews.title: Very good massager!
customer_reviews.text: We like the foot massager a lot. You can vary the degree of pressure from settings of 1-5. the pressure/tightness increases and decreases in a pattern throughout the 15-minute treatment, no matter what setting you have it on, but the higher the setting, the tighter it gets on the increase. Two things keeping me from giving it the full 5 stars: the heat is not really noticeable and the pressure/tightness at the heels is very low, so you don't get as much massage effect on the heels as most people would prefer. Still, it gives a good massage, and my feel feel much better after using it. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MELANIE A BARNETT

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and INTENSE. This is far from a gentle massage- more like a deep tissue. I had plantar fasciitis (I work in a hair salon) and this machine was gifted to me because my feet were constantly in pain. I have not had ANY pain that I experienced prior to using this product. If you’re on the fence and can handle this type of intensity, I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Heat feature is a major fail
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought it primarily for the heat component and secondarily for the massage component because my feet cramp up at night and heat helps the most. I thought this was the perfect product because not only would the heat help my cramping, but I thought the simultaneous massage would be a bonus. Sadly, there is no noticeable difference in the temperature when you turn the heat on. The massage is great, but if you want a product that actually provides a heated massage buy another product.
customer_reviews.author: BnSmAsDo

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager and Miko has incredible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot massager, and Miko has incredible customer service. The one I received made a loud noise, so I called Miko and played them a recording of the noise. They said it shouldn’t make that noise, asked for my amazon order number and a model number on the bottom. Within 24 hours I received a new one that was very quiet, only the gentle sound of the rollers and the air bags inflating and deflating. Great service. I am impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Hideki

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: If you have sore feet and need quick relief this will fit the bill. I have used it several times after standing for long periods of time and while it may be a bit uncomfortable at first it loosens all the muscles in your feet ultimately leaving you pain free when it is all said and done. Works the entire foot with the kneading on the bottom and the compression on top. Excellent product. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure on the parts you actually need pressure on
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but it just didn't work well enough for me. The problem is it doesnt apply enough pressure on the Arc and Heel (where the Plantar Fascitiis muscle is located on your foot). I will say that it does massage the toe area pretty well. For $140 I was hoping this would be the one but I can't justify spending that much on a machine that only targets one area. Will be returning and going with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Eng Vang

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Cons: -Pushes my foot out so I have to keep leaning over to hold device while I push my feet back in. I am size 11 -the massage balls are not deep enough. -it only massages the first half of my foot -hard to keep feet straight in it, have to keep holding knees together Pros: Easy Setup The pressure cushion is nice
customer_reviews.author: Herbman

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I ❤ This product! I have diabetes and have started having foot pain. I bought this on a whim and am so glad I did. My foot pain is gone. I use this everyday and it feels so good on my tired feet. I can't wait until winter to warm my feet up i this This product is easy to use and comes with an extra remote in case you lose one. I recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: red77ray

customer_reviews.title: It does do a good job with the pressure and kneading action
customer_reviews.text: It does do a good job with the pressure and kneading action. Based on the location of the kneading mechanisms, I think it's primarily intended for people with average-to-larger feet. That would would be my only complaint, but not a fault in the device, necessarily. No action for the heels or ankles, obviously, so consider that as well. Overall, a solid massager for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price if your feet hurt!
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying our new foot massager since we received it. Switch it back and forth between us during the evening. Our kids and grand kids love it as well, everyone using it likes the results. My 8 year old grand daughter has no problem operating the remote. Overall, a great purchase. We still haven't used it enough to justify a 5 star rating on pain mitigation. It definitely makes our feet feel better but we don't feel that we could rate it at the highest level without using it a while longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Miko Foot Massager. It can be a bit intense so I like to use it on the P1 or P2 setting while sitting at my desk. The only improvement I would recommend would be to relocate the power supply plug to the back of the massager to keep the power supply cord away from the wheels of my office chair. With the plug on the front you need to bend the wire under the unit to keep it away from your chair or it becoming a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Forchia

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing, love the pressure control
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend because he is on his feet all day long (and it’s also secretly for me). Being able to control the pressure is probably my favorite feature! I need a deep knead (haha see what I did there?) It feels amazing. We didn’t actually get a remote for it, but we just set it and forget it anyway. My only criticism is that I wish the was a ‘kneader’ along the side of the foot too.
customer_reviews.author: TheVamPirateQueen

customer_reviews.title: Helping my cramped feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad cramp in my left foot. I think I got it from walking in shoes that were half a size too big for too long. This thing is really helping to work the kinks out. The pressure variation is nice and gives a good range from very soft to high-pressure massaging. There's also enough wiggle room if you use a lower setting so that you can move your feet around and press different parts into the kneading areas of the device. Easy to set up and maintain, pretty much started using it right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M. Romaneck

customer_reviews.title: It promotes healthy feet & happy life for my family.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my house uses it everyday. I cannot describe better than it really works. The only thing I am not completely satisfied with it is the heat function is very weak. I am not sure what temperature it should get when the feature is turned on. And the kneading strength levels above 2 are unbearable for my feet. I could not take P3 for the entire session-15 mins. I would like to explore other foot & body massaging gadgets from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shin Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice massager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this massager for my wife but I hijacked from her! I have Plantars ficitous and my right foot hurts all the time. The massager feels great on my feet although having size 12 feet it doesn't reach my heel area and that's where I could really use it but I did buy it for my wife, not me and it massages the rest of my foot fine.
customer_reviews.author: TJDCMD

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I like that its heated, if it could get a little hotter that would be even better. the pressure is good, although the difference between pressure #2 and #3 is a lot! I want to go higher than #2, but then I feel like my toes are breaking on #3. it does 15min at a time, I usually do 3 or 4 rounds at a time. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Great foot message.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my feet. I walk 10 miles a day for 4 days a week at my job. This product helps my aching feet. I probably should find a job where I don't walk as much. I use it 4 times a week after work and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Kjellon

product_meta.title: Miko Shiatsu Foot Massager With Deep-Kneading, Multi-Level Settings, And Switchable Heat Charcoal Grey
feature_bullets: Relieve tired feet and improve blood flow with deep kneading, shiatsu rolling, and heat functions.
Shiatsu massage with 2 independent foot chambers and 5 air pressure settings . 2 Wireless remotes.
Alleviate discomfort from plantar fasciitis, neuropathy, diabetes, chronic pain, muscle tension,etc.
Use your foot massager while watching TV, reading, working at the office, or just relaxing. Removable covers for easy washing.
1 year full warranty if you are not fully satisfied. With that said, add one to your cart today.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,184 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
